comment.author: 77788549@N05
comment._content: 26518 Pte J A Thornber, born in Blackburn Lancashire in 1879.  1st Battalion East Lancashire Regiment was in 11th Brigade in 4th Division.

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content:
Son of Mr. and Mrs. J. R. Thornber, of 95, Bastwell Terrace, Blackburn. He was born 31 Mar 1879. His baptism record shows his parent as James and Sarah Ann.
In 1911 he was living with his parents at 91 Whalley New Road, Blackburn. He was described as a Clerk (mineral Water Enesco Manufacturer). His father's name was shown as James Ramsden Thornber.
